Streaming Device" under a grantee code of a random LLC (''Verdegrass LLC''). {{FCC ST|12/04/2018|indexme.}} ==Links of Interest== ===Teardowns=== * [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Amazon+Fire+TV+Cube+Teardown/110982 ''Amazon Fire TV Cube Teardown'' (Video) on '''iFixit'''] : "30-002759 REV 01" is silkscreened on the board. ===Device specifications=== * [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/fire-tv/device-specifications.html?v=ftvcube ''Device Specifications for Fire TV'' on '''Amazon'''] ==See also== *[[Amazon Fire TV Devices]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
